00009 bool resetCurrent(MavenCompiler* c, string file, string namespaceName, int newLineNumber) {
00010         c->currentClass = MAVEN_BARE_CLASS;
00011         c->currentFunction = "";
00012         c->currentNamespace = namespaceName;
